cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 365 mi (590 km) SE of Corpus Christi, Texas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from south of Port Mansfield, TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande; Tropical Storm Watch south of the mouth of the Rio Grande to Boca de Catan, MX
